SEARCH
Package apimangager

Class ApiQuery

java.lang.Object
apimangager.ApiQuery
public class ApiQuery extends Object
Query is the class that generate valid queries for the ApiCaller
Author:
Theo Seng

    This is a list of all the relations that can be used in every query

  • Method Details

    • generalSearch

      public static String generalSearch(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search a term anywhere in books' entries in the BNF's API
      Parameters:
      term - is the string in the URL that the user inputed
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchByAuthor

      public static String searchByAuthor(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search a term in the authors' name
      Parameters:
      term - is the string in the URL that the user inputed
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchByTitle

      public static String searchByTitle(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search a term in the titles of the books
      Parameters:
      term - is the string in the URL that the user inputed
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchBySubject

      public static String searchBySubject(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search a term in the subject section of the books' entries
      Parameters:
      term - is the string in the URL that the user inputed
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchByDate

      public static String searchByDate(String year, ApiQuery.DateRelation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search books by using a date(YYYY format)
      Parameters:
      year - is a date using the YYYY format
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchByLanguage

      public static String searchByLanguage(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search books by language
      Parameters:
      term - is a string that can be the name of a language or the BNF's norms for abbreviating languages' names
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

    • searchByISBN

      public static String searchByISBN(String term, ApiQuery.Relation relation)
      Function used to create a query to search books by using the ISBN
      Parameters:
      term - is a string containing the ISBN the user wants to search
      relation - refers to the enum Relation
      Returns:
      a valid query that can be used in the call function of ApiCaller

      public static void main(String[] args)
